'''Lucky Dog''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:1-Star Artifacts|1-star]], [[:Category:2-Star Artifacts|2-star]], and [[:Category:3-Star Artifacts|3-star]] rarities.

==Dropped By==
{{Dropped By}}

==How to Obtain==
* [[Chest]]s
* [[Investigation]]
* [[Zhang Shun#Shop|Zhang Shun's shop]]
* [[Yamashiro Kenta#Shop|Yamashiro Kenta's shop]]
* [[Domain of Guyun]]
* [[Normal Boss]]es
* [[Adventurer Handbook#Experience|Adventurer Handbook Experience]] Chapter 1:
** "Open 15 chests" for a 2{{star}} [[Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet]]
** "Upgrade the Statues of The Seven in Mondstadt to Lv. 2" for a 2{{star}} [[Lucky Dog's Hourglass]]
** 3{{star}} [[Lucky Dog's Clover]] for completing all tasks in chapter 1
* Adventurer Handbook Experience Chapter 2:
** "Activate 6 Teleport Waypoints" for a 2{{star}} [[Lucky Dog's Goblet]]
